title: Which branch can I get at... No. Don't make such posts. Refer to the linked image and make an informed decision.

comments.body: If you have specific branch-related questions, post them here. Else if you want to directly reach out to seniors/alumni and get more detailed feedback about PES, join the [PESU Discord server](https://discord.gg/pesu-discord-742797665301168220) and post your questions there.
What course is BT¬†
Bio tech
Ohh thanks¬†
Is there any chance of the cutoff getting increased? i am missing my targeted branch only by some ranks
That is not something students can predict. We do know that seats have increased, but so has the number of people writing PESSAT.
will they mail us about councelling?
So wait any rank beyond 5k is worthless?
thank you!
Too early to say that. Seats have increases, and so has the fees. But the number of aspirants as well. Usually cutoffs do increase but no way to say how much.
But this is only round 1 cutoff
Yes, you will get a mail regarding the date and time of your counseling as well as relevant instructions and documents to bring.
ok thank you
I don't think so. Either way, do not depend on round 2 counseling since PES is infamous for selling empty seats after round 1 to management quota.
btw what are the chances of getting cse in ec campus in first round
You can get mechanical
now the ranks are out ...when will we get to know this yrs cutoff ...as this time -ve marking was there
Depends on your rank
When counselling happens as simple as thatüíÄ
Cutoffs are determined after counseling. You cannot know the cutoffs beforehand.
is pessat taking seats from cet this yr???
Alright
466 rank can l get CSE main campus
I've got 3506 rank in pessat üíÄüíÄ can I possibly get CSE with AI/ML in EC campus?
CET and PESSAT seats are independent.

yes, but counselling is clashing with the JEE ADVANCED dates. And this year to reserve seat you need to be present with the candidate at the ring road campus. 

so given the fees constraint + counselling clashing with advanced + need of being present offline + seats increasing + ppl needing to travel during other counselling we might get a chance, right?

You very well can
And i believe you will get 40% scholarship too

Can someone explain the refund policy?
Like if we block a seat can we take refund at any time if we get a better seat somewhere/get pes through kcet only?
Counseling is offline every year. There are a lot of variables in the equation. Theoretically, yes, the cutoffs should increase but no way to say how much.

It should be close. Just wait and see. 

But the fees have increased, and the number of seats have increased. And apparently the counselling is offline only. 

So logically the cutoffs should go up, but nobody can say for sure
Pretty sure it's gonna be on 25 and 26th
yea ur right
when is the 40% scholarship rule applicable? could someone pls explain
40% scholarship is obtained by scoring within top 20% of students based on sgpa. it doesn't depend on pessat rank.
oh okayyy they had something like that put up on each cubical
You can see the picture on this post right?
Does anybody have the cutoffs for ppl applying thru jee main quota?
98.5 for cse main campus

Anything at 8.2k??
I know this is very bad rank...
That is after you join. You get a return based on how you perform each semester.
IS DOING ECE WORTH IN PES?
I got 14XX rank what are the odds of getting CSE in RR campus? Will the fees be refunded if we get a better college?
It wasn't loading at the time
Is this a confirmed news that the number of seats have increased? By how many?
It's confirmed from the seat matrix of this year compared to previous years.
Hey do you have any info about the comedk cut off for PES
Is it worth attending the counselling for 3.7k rank?, i want cs and I'm not sure if I'll get it.¬†
Can counseling dates be postponed cus it's crashing with advanced date? Do I have to requesting email to pesu?
PES does not take admissions via ComedK.
You can request them but they in all likelihood won't change the dates.
Attend the counseling. You have nothing to lose.
i did that last year, they hold back some money though, i forgot how much but yeah
Where can I find the seat matrix?
yeah i recieved the mail and have to confirm my attendance
Are we supposed to pay the fees immediately to confirm or is there some other procedure? Coz I got vit IT branch and yet to decide my clg.
got 58xx any hopes?

I got a rank of 6307. And I got a mail asking me to attend the counselling on 26th May. So based on your post, you're saying that I wouldn't be getting ECE in even EC campus? Is there a chance for me to get ECE in any branch as the no.of seats increased?

I got a rank of 6307. And I got a mail asking me to attend the counselling on 26th May. So based on your post, you're saying that I wouldn't be getting ECE in even EC campus? Is there a chance for me to get ECE in any branch as the no.of seats increased?
tbh i wouldnt keep high hopes for cse in rr campus, u can surely try in ec campus though.
Write a mail to pessat@pes.edu mentioning these Constraints they May Change to next week.
7k rank, shd i even go for counselling?
i got 15xx rank in pessat. Will i get CS AIML in ring road campus or ec campus? Will the cutoff trends change?
ppl mostly give pessat for backup and end up in other clgs like bits, vit n stuff so that way roughly how many seats in pes get left? are there more chances of others getting a seat?
you mostly will

I got 19xx rank. Can I get CS in RR campus given that the seats have increased... Btw o have got CS in VIT Vellore
Not sure which one to go for. Pls helpüôè
What is the refund policy of PES???
You can take a refund except for the 10k DD

PES is no longer a "backup" college. Things have changed over the last few years due to the increase in competition for better colleges. A lot of people appear for counseling. Last time, there were only a handful of seats left in every branch (if not 0 seats) for round 2.
Go for counseling. There is nothing to lose.
Nobody can predict, just go for counseling.
You need to pay the fees to confirm the seat.
Immediately?¬†
Refund is given only if you get PES also via CET. If I am not wrong, they used to also give a refund if you get into IIT/NIT (confirm this). Any other reasons, no refund.
PES CS > VIT CS. Just attend the counseling and see if you will get the seat.
right, do we get the full amt of counselling back if we dont take a seat?
I've got 11k rank, Is it useless to attend counselling?
Okay , thanks
Yep, on the spot.
Yes, if I remember correctly
yeah same idk people here have better ranks:(
Damn, thanks
From the cutoffs of last year. I am getting EEE. However if I get EEE, can I change it to ece after 1st year?
i dont think people above 10k rank will get seat.
THERE WAS NEGATIVE MARKING???
Got 7k in pessat will I be able to get something?
Same here, rank 6100
i got 105x rank, can i get cse in main campus?

Lol no, I am the back ranker ü§£
If ppl won't be present I'll have higher probability of getting a seat
You can see the picture and make an informed decision.
Unlikely. All branches usually close at roughly 6-7k
Don't depend on branch change, it depends on how many seats are available your CGPA as well. There is more info in the FAQs about this: [https://bit.ly/pesu-faq](https://bit.ly/pesu-faq)
yea thanks
lmao
i got 29xx rank, can i get ece in rr or cs in ec?
How risky is taking CSE RR for first round and CSE EC for 2nd round? I have 133X, Maybe cutoffs can go up?
there wasn't.. maine kiya check ek-do site pr lmao
sahi hai thats what I thought too
there was... 0.25 for every wrong
When does session 2 counseling begin??

dammn boi  
mai toh bc sarra tukka marrke aayi lmao.. oof oof stupid ass me

me too 6415  
is it worth it to attend the counselling when we are not getting Cs or Ece
no, esp if u hv bitsat etc as options left
What's DD?? I got a mail and in total there are 4 DD's, where will this money go, will it be added in my tuition fee or what?? Can anyone explain

Your parents will know what a DD is. 

And yes, to confirm your seat you need to pay the fees for the first year. That's why they ask you to bring those DDs.
Okay thank you
How is there risk involved in taking a seat?

If I don't get CSE RR in the first round (which is likely), The chance of me getting CSE EC in the 2nd round is less, Because I've been told in the 2nd round there's only 20 or so seats left in total. Wheras If I took CSE EC in the first round, I would've easily gotten it.
My PESSAT rank is 2.4k, is there a chance that I can get CS/CS- AI and ML in EC campus?
VIT CS.
what about aiml in main campus?
I got a rank of 240X. Is cs(ai ml) possible in the main campus?
The point of this post is not to ask such questions and use the cutoffs listed to get your answer.
bro VIT is somewhere higher up in rankings like NIRF or others, no comparison only VIT CS obvio you high or something? go for it
what about a rank of 1160
I got 39xx rank. Will i be able to get CS Aiml atleast by the final round?? When is the final round usually held?
So to confirm our seat we pay the DDs which is **non refundable** right??
If CS RR gets over in the first round, you can always pick CS EC in the first round itself. I don't seem to understand the risk involved here since you say you can easily get CS EC
Round 2 usually happens about a month after round 1
Look at the cutoffs and conclude on your own. That's the point of the post.

You can conclude on your own after seeing the cutoffs. 

The final round is usually about a month or so after the first round. It's hard to determine the first round cutoffs since nobody records them, but since the second round usually has at most 5-10 seats, it is usually around the same number
The 10k is non-refundable. The amount you get back of the tuition fee depends on when you cancel admission. They charge a certain penalty based on how late you are.
I asked this because they have called people till the rank of 8k, so is there any chance for ece or eee in pes any campus(my exact rank is 71XX)
What are the cons of joining pes University In cs Branch

Hi, what are the refund policies? 
I have got a rank of 36xx, if I go to Bangalore for the councelling and book my seat but then I want to cancel my seat for COEP or PICT, 
how much will they take from the DD's??

10k cannot be refunded. The remaining refund amount depends on how late you ask for a refund. As long as it is before classes begin, they should return the full fees. If it is after, then they deduct a certain % of your fee for every day of class you attend.

This is what it usually is, not sure if it has changed this year. Best to get this clarified with someone in the admission department.

I read on their website about the NIT/IIT refund thing, so how about that?
Like I'm not doubting you but I just want to know that how do you know the above thing you said.
Btw, thanks dude! :)

Yeah only if you get into those colleges you get a full refund. Otherwise the penalty applies. 

I know the above thing (among other things about PES) because i am one of the oldest grads on this sub. 

But as I said, best to always ask the admission department directly for current info.
Yeah ok, thank you for your help dude!
I got 49xx rank. Any chance of me getting cs or cs aiml in ec campus ?
Same rank. Did you attend counselling?
Nope. I didn't. Tbh all the courses except mechanical was closed around 4.3k something idk

honestly there is barely any difference's between the campuses and they wont even mention the name of the campus on your degree  
so decide wrt to commute and branch
can I get cse in pessat round 2, rank 461
Mostly yes. Attend round 2.
I just want to know my chances, like I can get ec campus through cet, and I should apply for manipal counseling also, so if I'm getting here, I won't do it
I want to know my chances, coz I'm getting manipal also, so should I go for manipal or wait for round 2
Bro not to doubt you or anything but where did you get this info? I can't find it at all on pesu's website
i Received a rank of 60XX in PESSAT 2024, will i be able to get EEE in the 2nd round of counselling?
Nobody can say for sure. Attend counseling.

FY25 sheet not updated since long time
I'm not the one who updates the sheet. Try finding out who does and reach out to them.
